Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 1
Description.Text: Our Dubai business hotel offers more than 86,000 square feet of indoor and outdoor event space.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 2
Description.Text: Awe-inspiring convention rooms feature state-of-the-art audiovisual technology and Wi-Fi access.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 3
Description.Text: The business center and Concierge Level at our corporate hotel in Dubai offer secretarial services.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 4
Description.Text: Our exquisite and succulent event menu will complement and inspire all your meeting needs.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 5
Description.Text: Expert catering, intuitive service and a certified events team guarantee a memorable occasion.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 6
Description.Text: Our Dubai business hotel's size can comfortably cater to group sizes exceeding 500 rooms or more.

Description.Name: Hotel Alert
Description.Text: A Dubai tourism fee of AED 20 per bedroom per night will be charged at check-out. The fee applies to ALL bookings.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 1
Description.Text: Enjoy ancient Hammam spa treatments and modern luxury massage therapies at SARAY SPA, a premier health and wellness haven here in the heart of Dubai.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 2
Description.Text: With two exquisite ballrooms and 32 meeting room, our 5-star hotel is ideal for a special occasion or business convention in downtown Dubai.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 3
Description.Text: From our signature steakhouse, Prime68, to our spectacular penthouse bar, Vault, experience the best of Dubai's dining and nightlife at our hotel.

Description.Name: Description
Description.Text: Discover unmatched luxury at the new JW Marriott Marquis Hotel Dubai, a spectacular 5-star resort located in the Dubai's Business Bay district.

Description.Name: Property Description Long
Description.Text: A new 5-star destination in Dubai, the JW Marriott Marquis Hotel Dubai is a striking addition to an already spectacular city. As the world's tallest hotel, we boast over 1,600 guest rooms and suites spread out across two towers and 72 spectacular floors. Enjoy panoramic city views from our luxury accommodations, all of which are outfitted with spa-like marble bathrooms, 46-inch LCD TVs, and plush bedding. We invite you to explore our hotel's dazzling array of amenities, such as our signature SARAY Spa and our state-of-the-art health and fitness center. Catering to travelers of all tastes, we offer an array of diverse restaurants from which you can explore the flavors of Dubai and beyond. Elevated above the city's business district on Sheikh Zayed Road, our hotel offers guests easy access to such notable attractions as the world-renowned The Dubai Mall and the jaw-dropping Burj Khalifa. Come discover why the JW Marriott Marquis Hotel Dubai is an unforgettable experience in a truly unforgettable city.

Description.Name: Sales Message
Description.Text: 20 minutes from Dubai International Airport and located in the heart of the city on the buzzing Sheikh Zayed Road, Business Bay area, close to Downtown Burj Khalifa.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 1
Description.Text: We're the tallest hotel not only in Dubai but in the world, with 1,368 luxury rooms and 240 suites.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 2
Description.Text: Our accommodations feature the latest in technology, including 46-inch LCD TVs with USB connections.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 3
Description.Text: Relax in our spa marble bathrooms, outfitted with rain showers and separate oversized bath tubs.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 4
Description.Text: Enjoy breathtaking city views of Dubai from one of our guest rooms or luxury penthouse suites.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 5
Description.Text: Settle into our deluxe beds outfitted with plush down comforters, custom duvets, and crisp linens.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 6
Description.Text: Reserve a Executive Level room for special benefits like complimentary hors d'oeuvres and cocktails.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights
Description.ListItem: We're the tallest hotel not only in Dubai but in the world, with 1,368 luxury rooms and 240 suites.
Our accommodations feature the latest in technology, including 46-inch LCD TVs with USB connections.
Relax in our spa marble bathrooms, outfitted with rain showers and separate oversized bath tubs.
Enjoy breathtaking city views of Dubai from one of our guest rooms or luxury penthouse suites.
Settle into our deluxe beds outfitted with plush down comforters, custom duvets, and crisp linens.
Reserve a Executive Level room for special benefits like complimentary hors d'oeuvres and cocktails.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 1
Description.Text: With over 80,000 square feet of flexible venue space, we can accommodate a wedding of any size.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 2
Description.Text: Our premier wedding hall, the Dubai Ballroom, can host over 1,000 guests for a dazzling reception.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 3
Description.Text: Relax and allow our certified wedding planners to orchestrate every element of your special event.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 4
Description.Text: We offer over 20 meeting rooms for an intimate wedding reception or rehearsal dinner in Dubai.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 5
Description.Text: Plan your dream wedding menu with the assistance of our experienced on-site catering services.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 6
Description.Text: Located in downtown Dubai, our hotel boasts a great location for out-of-town wedding guests.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 1
Description.Text: Easily visit the world's tallest building, Burj Khalifa, from our hotel's Business Bay location.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 2
Description.Text: Only 20 minutes from the Dubai International Airport, our hotel is easily accessible for travelers.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 3
Description.Text: Our luxury hotel is also near the spectacular Dubai Mall, the world's largest shopping center.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 4
Description.Text: Located in the heart of the city on the buzzing Sheikh Zayed Road

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 5
Description.Text: Only a few minutes away the Dubai Mall, one of the world's largest shopping malls.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 6
Description.Text: Dubai World Trade Centre is only 10 minutes away from the hotel

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Kitchen6 presents guests with an array of international cuisine prepared in an interactive, open kitchen. Reservations are required.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Enjoy high-quality meats in a refined, sophisticated setting at Prime68, our signature Dubai steakhouse. Reservations are required.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Stop by La Farine, our 24-hour French bistro and bakery, for delicious baked goods, light fare, freshly-roasted coffee, and hand-squeezed juices.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Explore modern Indian cuisine here in Dubai. Crafted from fresh, flavorful ingredients, the dishes at Rang Mahal by Atul Kochhar are sure to please every palate. Reservations are required.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: A transporting restaurant experience in Dubai, Nawwara serves exotic Arabian fare against a stunning city backdrop. Reservations are required.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Located on our hotel's 71st and 72nd floors, our Vault bar boasts breathtaking views of Dubai, craft cocktails, and fine cigars. Reservations are required.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Ideal for a casual drink with coworkers or a quick bite with friends, The Lounge serves delicious light bar snacks and drinks in a laid-back environment.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Offering traditional comfort food in a casual environment, our Velocity restaurant allows guests to feel at home while traveling in Dubai, UAE.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Serving Thai classics like Tom Yung soup in a modern environment, Tong Thai offers guests a taste of Thailand in Dubai. Reservations are required.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Savor handmade pasta, authentic pizza and homemade gelato at Positano, our delicious Italian restaurant. Reservations are required.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: A cool, exciting place to share great food and drink with your friends, our casual Japanese restaurant in Dubai will delight even the choosiest taste buds. Enjoy social sushi at its best or celebrate in the fun of traditional hibachi-style meals.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Soak up some rays and enjoy a serene dining experience in a luxurious poolside location at Aqua Poolside Grill and Bar. Our refreshing pool deck bar serves delectable lunch and dinner options and tropical cocktails in a South Beach-chic ambiance.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Set across two floors and an outside terrace, GQ Bar Dubai offers a unique dining experience with a menu specially created by the Director of Conde Nast Restaurants Gary Robinson. GQ Bar Dubai is operated through a third party - entrance rules may apply.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: This casual restaurant in Deira, Dubai, UAE features freshly prepared international cuisine, including pasta, chicken, curries and more. With a variety of styles and flavors to suit all tastes, it’s the perfect place for a casual business meeting.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Enjoy casual dining at our Italian restaurant in Dubai. This original Cucina in Dubai focuses on trattoria-style Italian cooking, boasting a menu of luscious pasta dishes and wood-fired pizzas. Bask in the rustic atmosphere and share a meal with friends.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Among the premier restaurants in Deira, Dubai, this multi award-winning steakhouse features certified Angus steaks and fresh seafood. Discover exclusive dining at JW’s Steakhouse in line with the level of class you expect for executive business dinners.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Looking for a casual meal at the end of a long day? This all-American sports bar features casual cuisine, flat-screen TVs, pool tables and a smoking area. Come down and watch the big game or network at the bar with co-workers during our happy hour.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Indulge in authentic Bavarian fare at our Hofbrauhaus restaurant in Dubai, UAE. Dive into German culture with hearty meals, beers and atmosphere. Great for a night out with friends, relax and raise a glass at our German restaurant in Dubai.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Sample Eastern cuisine at Bamboo Lagoon. A blend of Polynesian, Indonesian and Thai foods will tantalize your palate while relaxing in an atmosphere of waterfalls, huts and live, authentic entertainment. Stop in for fresh fare with friends or clients.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Meet up for drinks or aperitifs at our elegant piano lounge. The Piano Lounge restaurant in Deira, Dubai, offers a classic atmosphere, hors d'oeuvres and an extensive beverage menu, making it the perfect stop before a night out, or maybe just a night cap.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Start your day off right with a quality cup of coffee at the Atrium Café. This casual restaurant in Deira, Dubai, features Starbucks coffee, refreshments and light meals. It’s perfect for those mornings you just have time to grab something on the go.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: When you need a late night caffeine boost, stop into Vienna Café. This 24-hour cafe offers traditional Austrian cakes and food including their famous home-made Baumkuchen. Catch up with friends or clients any time of day in this quiet, authentic café.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Located on the 52nd floor of our hotel, The Observatory offers magnificent 360-degree views across Dubai Marina. Stop by the restaurant and bar after work for a happy hour or indulge in a spectacular champagne brunch buffet in Dubai.

Address.AddressLine: Dubai Marriott Harbour Hotel & Suites,,Al Sufouh Road, Dubai Marina

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Discover Spanish, Moroccan, French and Italian flavors in one of the premier Dubai Marina restaurants. After dinner, step out on the terrace under the stars with breathtaking views of the marina to end a relaxing day with an impressive backdrop.

Address.AddressLine: Dubai Marriott Harbour Hotel & Suites,,Al Sufouh Road, Dubai Marina

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Catch up with friends, family or colleagues or enjoy a good book at Counter Culture. As one of the most inviting restaurants in Dubai Marina, you can enjoy delicious culinary delights for breakfast and lunch in a relaxed coffee house atmosphere.

Address.AddressLine: Dubai Marriott Harbour Hotel & Suites,,Al Sufouh Road, Dubai Marina

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Relaxed street-level coffee shop featuring friendly service in a casual environment. An inviting setting with a tantalizing international menu that offers a satisfying and delicious dining experience.

Address.AddressLine: Marriott Executive Apartments Dubai Creek,Riga Al Buteen Street

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: This casual, poolside restaurant’s menu is full of satisfying sandwiches, snacks & refreshing beverages served daily from 10 a.m. until 6 p.m.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Specializing in rustic Italian dishes, including pizzas from a wood-burning oven and an antipasti counter, our Dubai Italian restaurant's menu brings the flavors of Italy to Dubai. Outdoor, lake-view seating is available.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Top among international restaurants in Dubai, Pine Grill serves breakfast, lunch and an a la carte dinner menu with a focus on freshly grilled steaks, seafood dishes and international fare. Outdoor seating, which overlooks the lake, is available.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Award winning restaurant, BICE Mare, serves seafood inspired cuisine in the heart of Dubai Downtown Burj area with views of the iconic Burj Khalifa and the Fountain show from its highly sought after terrace.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Al Mahara, "The Oyster Shell" in Arabic, doesn’t just tantalise your palate; it’s a dining experience that will stimulate all your senses.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Offering authentic Thai cuisine, Mango Tree is located in the exclusive Souk Al Bahar, set against a backdrop of the Burj Khalifa and the fabulous Dubai Fountain.

Description.Text: Exit onto Sheikh Zayed Road North and travel towards Deira via the Maktoum bridge. Stay left and take the exit for Sharjah. At the first main junction turn right and then take the first left to Dubai City Center Mall.

Description.Name: Driving Instructions from Airport
Description.Text: Travel northeast on 17th Street toward Al Maktoum Road/D89. Turn right onto Al Maktoum Road/D89 then take the first right onto Omar Bin Al Khattab Road/D88. Turn left onto Baniyas Road/D85 and travel 1.1 km. Take the ramp onto Umm Hurair Road/D78. Travel 3.8 km and continue onto Sheikh Zayed Road/E11. Travel 7.3 km and take the exit toward Sheikh Zayed Road. Keep left at the fork in the road to continue toward Sheikh Zayed Road. Travel 0.85 km. Keep left at the fork in the road and merge onto Sheikh Zayed Road. Travel 0.9 km and make a slight right then a slight left. Turn right.

Transportation.Description: Drive Time to Airport in Rush Hour
Bus from Airport to Hotel Fee (one-way)
Subway from Airport to Hotel Fee (one-way)
Rail from Airport to Hotel Fee (one-way)

Description.Name: Driving Instructions from Airport
Description.Text: Travel southwest and turn right after approx. 1.1km. Continue straight on the first roundabout and travel for 3 km. Take the first exit at the roundabout. After 2km, take the first exit at the roundabout. After 350m take a slight right to D53 and after 4.3km take the ramp to Sheikh Zayed Road/E11. Keep left at the fork and merge onto Sheikh Zayed Road (North)/E11, towards Sharjah. Continue on Sheikh Zayed Road/E11 and travel 30.1km. Take the Business Bay exit and turn left at the junction. You will pass the DNATA and Emirates Holidays building on your right hand side. Continue straight for approx. 150m and take the first exit on the roundabout. Continue straight for approx. 200m and take a right turn at the traffic lights. Continue straight for about 600m and the entrance of the JW Marriott Marquis Dubai will be on your right hand.

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: 50% off on 90 min treatments. Conditions apply.

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Receive a 50% discount on all 90 minute treatments at Saray Spa. The discount is available until 30 September except on Fridays. For more information and to make a reservation, call + 971 4 414 6754 or email mhrs.dxbjw.spa@marriott.com

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Free Wifi and Breakfast for our Executive Guests

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Enjoy the extra space and privacy of our Executive rooms and suites offering many benefits such as 24 hour access to the Executive lounge including complimentary breakfast, afternoon tea and evening cocktail selection, internet and business services.

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Important New Tax Information in Dubai

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Dubai Department of Tourism and Commerce Marketing has implemented a new Tourism Tax (Tourism Dirham). This will be effective for all stays from March 31st 2014. This tax will be charged on checkout and the fee for this hotel is AED 20 per bedroom per night.

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Important New Tax Information in Dubai

Description.Name: Message Text

Description.Name: Value proposition 1
Description.Text: Comprising two iconic towers, the JW Marriott Marquis stands elevated above Dubai’s Business Bay on Sheikh Zayed Road. The hotel is a 20min drive from Dubai International Airport and close to the World Trade Center, Dubai Mall and Burj Khalifa.

Description.Name: Value proposition 2
Description.Text: Thoughtfully designed around the needs of today’s modern traveler, all guest rooms achieve the perfect balance of effortless style and functionality, incorporating state-of-the-art technology, including LCD TVs, iPod stations, and wireless Internet.

Description.Name: Value proposition 3
Description.Text: Thoughtfully designed around the needs of today’s modern traveler, all guest rooms achieve the perfect balance of effortless style and functionality, incorporating state-of-the-art technology, including LCD TVs, iPod stations, and wireless Internet.

Description.Name: Value proposition 4
Description.Text: The JW Marriott Marquis Dubai accommodates small-to large-scale meetings and conferences with over 7,500sqm of indoor and outdoor event space. Two ballrooms and 32 flexible meeting rooms provide state-of-the-art venues for every agenda.

Description.Name: Value proposition 5
Description.Text: The JW Marriott Marquis Dubai plays host to an inspiring collection of nine restaurants, four bars and two lounges. Guests will discover a microcosm of authentic international cuisines, which together offer a diverse dining experience.

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: High season for corporate and groups

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: Shoulder season for corporate and groups

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: Low summer season and Islamic month of ramadan

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: High season for transient travel and groups, good weather.

Description.Name: Group Description
Description.Text: The JW Marriott Marquis Hotel Dubai is located at the center of the global business crossroads in Dubai, in the heart of the city in Business Bay, off Sheikh Zayed Road and just 20min away from Dubai International Airport and 10 minutes from the World Trade Center and the Financial District. All 1,608 luxurious guest rooms are thoughtfully designed around the needs of today’s modern traveller. Each room incorporates state-of-the-art technology, including LCD TVs, iPod stations, and wireless internet. Guests can explore a myriad of taste sensations with an inspiring collection of nine restaurants, five bars and lounges including signature restaurants such as the Indian Rang Mahal by Atul Kochhar or the Boutique Steakhouse called Prime68. The hotel accommodates small-to large-scale meetings and conferences with over 7,500 sqm of indoor and outdoor event space. Two ballrooms and 32 flexible meeting rooms provide state-of-the-art venues for your event. Alternatively, three stunning outdoor venues with incredible views over Downtown Dubai create an inspired atmosphere that will set the stage for an unforgettable event.

Description.Name: Sales strategy
Description.Text: This hotel supports the case in presenting Dubai as a key location for major conventions attracting business from the traditional markets and the emerging BRIC economies aided by Dubai's superb geographical location with 1/3rd of the worlds population living with 4 to 5 hour flight of Dubai.The hotel has 14 restaurant and bar outlets or across the over 7,500 sqm of indoor and outdoor event space. The hotel is the place where 1,000 people plus can meet, dine and sleep under one roof, offering high group ceilings, ideal for large meetings and events. With 1,608 guest rooms in total across 57 floors, the hotel features up to 14 bedrooms per floor. Guest rooms are 54sqm of size in total. Private Floors as be arranged upon request.4 Duplex Penthouse Suites take luxury to new heights. The 624sqm Suites, feat
